scripts.backend:migrate: cd backend && DJANGO_DB_ENGINE=django.db.backends.sqlite3 uv run python manage.py migrate
scripts.backend:check: cd backend && DJANGO_DB_ENGINE=django.db.backends.sqlite3 uv run python manage.py check
scripts.backend:test: docker exec our-voice_backend_1 uv run pytest apps/ --ds=config.settings --tb=short --cov-fail-under=0
scripts.backend:test:coverage: docker exec our-voice_backend_1 uv run pytest apps/ --ds=config.settings --cov=apps --cov-report=html --cov-fail-under=80
scripts.backend:test:quick: docker exec our-voice_backend_1 uv run pytest apps/ --ds=config.settings --maxfail=5 --tb=short
scripts.backend:lint: docker exec our-voice_backend_1 uv run ruff check .
scripts.backend:format: docker exec our-voice_backend_1 uv run ruff format .
scripts.frontend:test: docker exec our-voice_frontend_1 bun run test
scripts.frontend:test:coverage: docker exec our-voice_frontend_1 bun run test:coverage
scripts.frontend:test:ui: docker exec our-voice_frontend_1 bun run test:ui
scripts.frontend:test:e2e: docker exec our-voice_frontend_1 bun run test:e2e
scripts.test: bun run test:backend && bun run test:frontend
scripts.test:backend: docker exec our-voice_backend_1 uv run pytest
scripts.test:frontend: docker exec our-voice_frontend_1 bun run test
scripts.test:e2e: docker exec our-voice_frontend_1 bun run test:e2e
scripts.test:coverage: bun run backend:test:coverage && bun run frontend:test:coverage
scripts.test:quick: bun run backend:test:quick && bun run frontend:test
scripts.lint: bun run backend:lint && bun run frontend:lint
scripts.ci:validate: bun run backend:check && bun run backend:lint && bun run frontend:lint
